Advisory.Description:
### Impact
Malicious packages with content Javascript that might be executed in the User Interface, stealing user credentials. 

### Patches
Users that still using `v3` must upgrade to **> 3.12.0** or, for those have no problem to migrate to a major version, **>= 4.0.0**.

### Workarounds
None.  Users must update.

### References
Are there any links users can visit to find out more?

https://www.npmjs.com/advisories/832
https://www.npmjs.com/advisories/833

### For more information
If you have any questions or comments about this advisory:
* Read the Security Policy to find the ways to be in contact with us.
